docs.snippet: The newly appointed Minister to Uruguay, Leland Harrison, accompanied by Mrs. Harrison and their small children, will sail today on the Western World for Montevideo. Mr. Harrison and his family have been in New York with his mother, Mrs. W. Henry...
docs.lead_paragraph: The newly appointed Minister to Uruguay, Leland Harrison, accompanied by Mrs. Harrison and their small children, will sail today on the Western World for Montevideo. Mr. Harrison and his family have been in New York with his mother, Mrs. W. Henry Harrison, at 39 West Fifty-second Street. He had been until recently the American Minister to Sweden.

docs.snippet: THE HAGUE, March 10.--The conference for the codification of international law concerning nationality and other questions, which meets here on Thursday under the presidency of Dr. Heemskerk, has been asked to grant to the International Council of...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE HAGUE, March 10.--The conference for the codification of international law concerning nationality and other questions, which meets here on Thursday under the presidency of Dr. Heemskerk, has been asked to grant to the International Council of Women and the International Alliance of Women for Suffrage and Equal Citizenship the right to send delegates, each with an advisory vote.
